programme.title: Legend Of The Female General
programme.desc: To protect her familys honor, He Yan disguises herself as a man and joins the battlefield. Betrayed, she returns with a new identity, fighting alongside a noble warrior to reclaim justice And destiny.

programme.title: In The Name Of Blossom
programme.desc: Yang Zi and Li Xian reunite in a fated romance. They secretly assist the emperor in taking down Prince Ning. Through danger and sacrifice, their bond deepens as they fight to protect the nation.

programme.title: An Everlasting Dunhuang Banquet
programme.desc: Based on the historical records of the murals in Mogao Grottoes And the documents found in the Tibetan Sutra Cave, dive into the distinctive traditional cooking techniques of Dunhuang cuisine.

programme.title: Forever Young
programme.desc: Twenty four old buddies travel to Quan Zhou, Wuyi Mountain And Mangshi to fulfill their dream journey with their "life bucket list", negating unfinished regrets And creating warm memories together.

programme.title: Craftsmanship and Ingenuity

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Diana masih berbelah bagi untuk menyerah diri kepada pihak polis. Sementara Suraya mula bimbang jika Arissa bertindak diluar kawalan selepas apa yang telah berlaku. Situasi semakin meruncing buat Rafael apabila gagal untuk menghubungi Diana. Rafael semakin risau sesuatu yang buruk telah terjadi kepada Diana.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Sesuatu yang buruk telah berlaku kepada Diana sehingga menyebabkan kematiannya. Rafael telah ditahan oleh pihak polis kerana terlibat didalam kes pembunuhan Diana. Rafael sedaya upaya cuba untuk ingat kembali apa yang sebenarnya berlaku pada malam Diana dibunuh.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Nurul Huda menasihati Nazril supaya tidak teruskan penipuan itu atau dia yang akan sampaikan sendiri dekat Puan Norida. Nurul Huda mempersoalkan sampai bila Nazril hendak menyiksa diri kerana dia tahu Nazril tidak bahagia bersama Maisara.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara katakan yang dia boleh hidup sendiri tanpa Nazril. Qistina tidak setuju dengan keputusan Maisara untuk berpisah dengan Nazril. Qistina mengingatkan yang Maisara tidak boleh memikirkan tentang dirinya saja, dan seharusnya memikirkan tentang anak dalam kandungannya.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara mengungkapkan perasaan cintanya, Nazril terus memintas dengan mengatakan cintanya sudah masuk ke liang lahad. Hatinya kosong dan semua sudah berakhir. Maisara menangis lagi. Dari kata-kata Nazril membayangkan hubungan itu retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Dia tidak sengaja sakitkan hati isterinya tetapi dia tidak mahu berpura-pura lagi. Walaupun belum melepaskan Maisara tetapi kasih sayangnya takkan mungkin seperti dulu. Kebahagiaan umi dan adiknya lebih utama baginya sekarang.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Setelah lama bercinta, Zariman akhirnya melamar Arissa untuk menjadi isterinya dan mula membuat perancangan perkahwinan. Rafael dilanda kemelut rumahtangga apabila dia syak Diana curang dengan dia.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Arissa dilanda dilemma, takut sekiranya selepas dia berkahwin dan berpindah, Suraya tidak dapat menjaga nenek mereka (Saleha) dengan baik. Rafael cuba untuk bersangka baik terhadap Diana, sehingga dia terbaca mesej Whatsapp Diana.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara menawarkan baju melayu yang dibelinya untuk Nazril dulu. Tanpa mengendahkan perasaan Maisara, Nazril terus menyarung baju melayu warna coklat pemberiaan Nurul Huda dan mengatakan dia tidak menyukai baju melayu warna biru. Mendengarkan itu, perasaan Maisarah pedih dan dia menangis.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Pak Su Saleem menasihati Nurul Huda untuk melaporkan kelakuan Maisara kepada Nazril dan menghasut Nazril untuk segera menceraikan Maisara. Sejak ketiadaan Aidil, Nazril semakin menjauhkan diri dan melayan Maisara endah tak endah.

programme.title: Just In Time
programme.desc: Xu Meng An thought she had everything under control until her companys layoff, her husband losing his job, her daughters early romance And the unexpected arrival of a second child.

programme.title: Focus on Europe

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: The Day presents the past 24 hours: close to the people, with a clear focus on the essential issue, and guests who outline their viewpoints on the stories of the day.

programme.title: Diva Dari Jakarta
programme.desc: Erin dan Ejot sering dibandingkan dari segi paras rupa. Sehingga suatu hari sesuatu telah berlaku kepada Erin yang mengubah segalanya.

programme.title: Diam Tanda Setuju
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat baik yang berhadapan dengan konflik perhubungan di saat mereka mula panik memikirkan usia mereka yang semakin meningkat tetapi belum bertemu jodoh.

programme.title: Nasiya
programme.desc: Ketika melarikan diri dari bekas suaminya, Ihyana telah mengalami kemalangan tetapi dia bernasib baik kerana telah diselamatkan oleh satu entiti luar biasa yang telah mengubah kelakuannya.

programme.title: Suamiku Encik Beruang
programme.desc: Ani, the most beautiful girl in the village, who is ever mans fantasy, decides to marry Mr. Bear as her husband, much to everyones surprise. As for the chief village, he intend to organise the "wedding of the year".

programme.title: Menanti Hari Itu
programme.desc: Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu terhadap anak kandungnya yang tidak pernah terpadam meskipun si anak menjauhkan diri akibat hasutan keluarga angkatnya sendiri.

programme.title: Kecundang Sebelum Menjanda
programme.desc: Hari terbahagia dalam hidup Nora berubah menjadi suram bila tunangnya menarik diri pada hari pernikahan mereka. Tambah buruk lagi, hari selepas tragedi itu asyik berulang atas sebab-sebab misteri.

programme.title: Aku Raja Lawak
programme.desc: Silah nak jadi pelawak yang terkenal, cuma di kampungnya tak ada peluang pekerjaan pelawak sepenuh masa. Tapi dia tetap mendapat sokongan padu daripada peminat nombor satunya iaitu Faris, anaknya.

programme.title: Bayangan Emilia
programme.desc: Rita berpindah masuk ke banglo Ungku Mahmud dan mula merasai akan kehadiran roh yang seperti tidak senang dengan kehadirannya disitu. Apakah misteri di sebalik rumah banglo tersebut?

programme.title: Oh Speak English Please
programme.desc: Kisah Sally anak remaja moden yang merasa malu dengan ibunya kerana tidak pandai berbahasa Inggeris dan berketrampilan agak kekampungan. Lakonan Rozita Che Wan dan Zahirah MacWilson.

programme.title: Striker Hati Ayah
programme.desc: Sofia susah untuk memilih antara dua calon, Raf atau Noah. Lalu meminta pendapat ayahnya, Adam. Kini dua lelaki tersebut terpaksa memenangi hati ayah Sofia, seorang peminat fanatik bola.

programme.title: Gebu Gebu Manis
programme.desc: Kisah Hamdi dan Dolah yang memulakan perniagaan dodol tetapi sering disabotaj oleh Amira yang cemburu dengan perniagaan dua orang sahabat ini.

programme.title: Wartawan Kampung
programme.desc: Mustaqim yang tidak habis belajar, pulang ke kampung mewujudkan laman web kampung disokong Tok Ketua Kampung Kambing. Untuk mempopularkan laman web itu, Mak Jah dan Mak Temah dilantik menjadi wartawan kampung untuk bahagian berita gosip dan hangat yang merancang untuk merampas laman web itu untuk kepunyaan sendiri. Akhirnya, berita menjadi finah, kampung pula menjadi porak-poranda.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Lukisan Cinta
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Khairul dan Natasha saling mencintai tetapi ditentang bapa Natasha kerana Khairul memilih kerjaya sebagai pelukis. Apakah kesudahan cinta mereka?

programme.title: Laksa Di Ambang Wati
programme.desc: Demi mendapatkan resepi laksa terbaik di Pulau Pinang, Mail dan kawan- kawan sanggup berbaik dengan Wati, gadis yang tak berapa lawa. Namun setelah Wati disunting oleh usahawan kosmetik terkenal, hidup Wati berubah dan Mail betul- betul jatuh cinta pada Wati.

programme.title: Perempuan Disarung Ungu
programme.desc: Kisah Marziah yang terpaksa menjalani hukuman penjara dalam keadaan mengandung kerana dituduh membunuh. Siapakah dalang yang sebenarnya bertanggungjawab? Lakonan Tya Ariffin dan Shukri Yahya.

programme.title: Hari Terakhir Seorang Pengurus
programme.desc: Kisah seorang pengurus yang tertekan dengan bebanan kerja mengambil keputusan untuk membunuh diri untuk memberi pengajaran kepada majikannya

programme.title: Asam Pedas Cendol Sejoli
programme.desc: Karim adalah pemilik kedai cendol bersebelahan dengan kedai asam pedas Kalsom. Mereka bermusuhan, tetapi anak mereka Kinah dan Khalil mencintai satu sama lain, dan terpaksa menyembunyikan perkara ini bagi mengelakkan perang antara dua kedai mereka.

programme.title: Lukisan Cinta
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Khairul dan Natasha saling mencintai tetapi ditentang bapa Natasha kerana Khairul memilih kerjaya sebagai pelukis. Apakah kesudahan cinta mereka?

programme.title: Patah Seribu
programme.desc: Ella returns from London, to spend her summer vacation back home, as Ellas mother forces her to celebrate the mothers 20th wedding anniversary with her stepfather. She meets Andy who practically ignores her all the time, at the ceremony. Andy, an ex- gangster of Chow Kit, intends to turn over a new leaf as he feels responsible for his mother being paralysed. Andys arrogance caught Ellas attention and this makes her love Andy even more after finding out his past story.

programme.title: Musnahkan Pelamin Anganku
programme.desc: Mikael yang merupakan seorang wedding planner menerima tawaran besar untuk menjayakan sebuah majlis perkahwinan pelanggannya. Namun majlis perkahwinan tersebut merupakan majlis bekas isterinya.

programme.title: Dua
programme.desc: Kisah Farhan yang kehilangan kembarnya Fahrin dalam satu kemalangan tragis. Dia kemudiannya mengambil-alih kehidupan Fahrin namun terperangkap dalam sebuah cinta tiga segi pula. Lakonan Eusoff Hashim dan Sharifah Sakinah.

programme.title: Racun Menantu
programme.desc: After marrying Zain, Sara lived in the same house with Pak Dolah, her father-in-law. Because of the familys grudge, Sara started making trouble by seducing her own father-in-law.

programme.title: Menantuku Rock
programme.desc: Ibu Salina ingin melihat anaknya itu berkahwin. Salina dengan bantuan Pak Mujid mula membuat senarai calon suami dan pelbagai senario lucu berlaku sehingga rahsia lama timbul semula.

programme.title: Cerai
programme.desc: Pengalaman berkurung dengan pasangan selama musim PKP memaksa dua pasangan suami isteri menilai semula perkahwinan mereka yang telah disalah ertikan selama ini.

programme.title: Hingga Jumpa Lagi
programme.desc: Eva is diagnosed with cancer and prays that she could travel back to the past in order to prevent the love between her and her husband so that her husband can lead a happy life. Her prayer is granted

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: I Heart You Cik Yah
programme.desc: Zulkefli and Badariah are always arguing, but in order to prevent the factory where they work from being closed by Qarina, they must work together. Out of hatred, they start feeling for each other.

programme.title: Jihan Nak Displin Anak
programme.desc: Jihan dan suami kalut apabila anak mereka tidak mahu pulang beraya di kampung. Mereka cuba untuk mendisiplinkan anak mereka sebelum hari raya

programme.title: Arts24
programme.desc: How do artists and writers see the world? We take you to the crossroads where culture meets the news and engages with whats happening in our lives today.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: An international news bulletin, presented live from the newsroom.

programme.title: Locked In
programme.desc: A single mother must protect her daughter and herself during a heist gone wrong at a high-tech storage facility.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: The Jews of Eastern Europe are being massacred by the thousands. Galvanised into action after the death of his wife, Hungarian barrister Sonson finds himself leading an inspirational fight back against the increasingly desperate and dangerous Nazis.

programme.title: Project Legion
programme.desc: A young man trapped in his apartment with a swarm of demons outside his door must find a way to survive the night and escape from apartment 213.

programme.title: The Commando
programme.desc: A DEA agent returns home with PTSD after a botched mission and must now protect his family from a home invasion when a recently freed convict and his henchmen come after their stash of millions hidden inside of the agents home.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - A Song To Kill For
programme.desc: Max Mayfair has it all; a beautiful girlfriend, Ava, a new London crime family, and thanks to his latest heist, a priceless diamond necklace. However, when mafioso Calbones henchmen catch up with Mike and Armen, determined to drag them back to New York to pay for their crimes, Max has everything to lose. Teaming up with his old friend, Marseille Mafia crime boss, Paul, Max hatches a plan to lure the New York Mafia to Mayfair.

programme.title: Broadcast
programme.desc: After a billionaire creates a drug called INOC which stops the aging process, the future of a world where death no longer exists is seen. The story of the fate of mankind is told while also revealing an elusive truth to its unknowing spectator.

programme.title: Crom
programme.desc: High school teenagers accidentally unleash an ancient Irish entity on their hometown and must stop it before midnight on Halloween.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Hayes Hodges, an attorney, takes up the offer of defending his friend Colonel Terry Childers, accused of ordering his squad to open fire on a group of demonstrators.

programme.title: Any Bullet Will Do
programme.desc: Two Brothers find themselves on opposing sides of the fight as one hopes to help abolish slavery while the other believes it is his God-given right.

programme.title: Broken Star
programme.desc: Abandoned by her friends and family and with her career in jeopardy, starlet Markey Marlowe is sequestered in a duplex with a reclusive landlord who just may be more dangerous than she is.

programme.title: Blood Of Redemption
programme.desc: When the most powerful criminal empire in the land comes crumbling down from within, it is up to a former henchman to put the puzzle pieces together in order to find those responsible and extract revenge.

programme.title: Mojave Diamonds
programme.desc: A former MMA fighter and his brothers must rescue their kidnapped family from a dangerous crime syndicate after $50M of illegal diamonds gets stolen.

programme.title: Johnny And Clyde
programme.desc: Johnny and Clyde are two serial killers who are on an endless crime spree. They decide to assemble a group of criminals and misfits to steal from Alanas casino and pull off the heist of the century.

programme.title: Mayfair - Shooting Paul
programme.desc: Hoping to put the past behind him and go legit, Max is persuaded by Paul to open a new Mister Mayfair club in Portugal. Conflict, however, seems to follow Max wherever he goes. Drawn into a violent turf war between London Gangsters and the Italian Mafia, his relationship with Ava is jeopardised by the arrival of his former flame, Serena. Maxs carefully crafted world seems to be collapsing around him. With his familys lives on the line, Max is blackmailed by British crime boss, Tommy, to assassinate his best friend, Paul.

programme.title: Centigrade
programme.desc: A married couple find themselves trapped in their frozen vehicle after a blizzard and struggle to survive amid plunging temperatures and unforeseen obstacles.

programme.title: Clean
programme.desc: Tormented by his criminal past, Clean attempts a quiet life caring for his community and as a mentor to his young neighbor Dianda. When local gang violence puts his neighbors life in danger, Clean finds himself returning to his violent past.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - Serenas Game
programme.desc: Refusing to comply with Tommys demands, Max and Paul conspire to have the British gangster eliminated and Serena arrested. With Tommy dead and Serena in handcuffs, it appears as though Max has succeeded. His plan goes awry, however, when MI6 force Max to help Serena bring down her employers: the Russian mob. Torn between a life of crime with Serena or happiness with Ava, nothing is ever simple in the life of Max Mayfair.

programme.title: American Sicario
programme.desc: Based on the true story, Edgar Valdez, drug lord and cartel leader, is betrayed by one of the brothers. Seeking retribution, Valdez will risk it all to gain control of the Feliz cartel.

programme.title: Operation Sea Wolf
programme.desc: The German Navy and the last remaining U-Boats, were formed together for one last mission to attack the United States Homeland.

programme.title: The Legion
programme.desc: Noreno, a half-Roman, is entrusted with the mission of crossing the snowy mountains of Armenia, swarming with Parthian patrols, to seek help for his slowly dying men.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: After planning a perfect heist, Nick is ready to score. One problem, his girl and the crew, have other ideas. They take Nick down in a hail of bullets but Nick doesnt die and in a race for his life, seeks revenge one target at a time.

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers. She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony.

programme.title: Hideout
programme.desc: Evading police at a remote farmhouse after fumbling a robbery, four criminals discover that the family living there is not who they appear to be.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - The Spyce Of Life
programme.desc: Returning from a romantic getaway with Ava, Max finds himself on the wrong side of the law yet again. Now blackmailed by MI6, Max must spy on two suspected terrorists; Aziz and Omar, who are regular customers at his club. Accompanied by his London crime family, Max breaks into Omars country estate and discovers his sinister plan. With everything on the line, Max must race to uncover a highly skilled hackers identity before its too late.

programme.title: Blindfire
programme.desc: A police officer who while responding to a violent hostage call, kills the African American suspect only to later learn of his innocence. Sensing this was a set-up, and facing repercussions, he must track down the person responsible while examining his own accountability and the ingrained racism which brought him to this point.

programme.title: Hunting Games
programme.desc: Two dangerous armed men must hunt each other and fight to death over millions of dollars in cash in this high octane wilderness survival story.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: During WWII, the American army have raced their way through the countryside on the border of France entering Nazi Germany. Hitler has deployed his secret weapon. Lieutenant Frank Ross encounters the Nazi weapon and an intense aerial battle ensues.

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: A female FBI agent is offered millions to help a thief escape from a hijacked airplane.

programme.title: In Isolation

programme.title: American Sicario

programme.title: Stirling - First War of Scottish Independence
programme.desc: This time on River Hunters, in the shadow of Stirling Castle, presenter and wild swimming loving Rick Edwards and real life river hunter Beau Ouimette, tackle the mighty river Forth. In the first archaeological river search of this spot ever, theyll be hunting for relics of Scotlands greatest medieval warriors William Wallace and Robert The Bruce. And revealing secrets from the battle sites of their most famous victories against their hated English overlords.

programme.title: China
programme.desc: In China, Rooftop and Catfish continue their East Asian adventures. As if the leeches in Indonesia werent enough, the bikers move on to bee sting therapy in China, strengthen their stomachs with some grasshoppers and mice wine, and attempt to transport hundreds of pounds of fish on nothing but a bike and sheer will power. The duo also undergo a hike of Chinese mountain Hua Shan, electro acupuncture, and kung fu train, all to be able to endure dim mak, the death touch. Can Rooftop and Catfish handle this intense physical journey, or will the death touch get the best of them?

programme.title: Into the Wild India

programme.title: Macaque Island

programme.title: Macaque Island

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for some cupcake chaos! Lulu wants to bake a cupcake by herself, but when she doesnt follow the recipe, it turns into a giant, out-of-control blob! She also finds a colorful egg that hatches into a cute chick, but she has to let it go back to its mommy. The friends paint a big picture together, but Newt wants it all for herself.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: All aboard the Morphle bus! Milas magic pet transforms into a big red bus for a fun-filled ride. But their joyful journey leads them to a bizarre discovery: a nearby town has been shrunk to the size of a toy! Its up to Mila and Morphle to investigate the strange phenomenon and figure out how to restore the tiny town to its proper size.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Mila and Morphle are hoping for a peaceful day of projects, starting with planting a vegetable garden. But when their magic seeds sprout into enormous, uncontrollable veggies, their plans get complicated! Their day is further interrupted when they must stop Orphle, who is recklessly driving a construction digger and threatening to ruin their garden and their entry for the town baking contest.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to do the scarecrow dance! Help Sunny the Scarecrow scare away some pesky pigeons to protect the farms crops. Its harvest time, so everyone helps pick the vegetables. Find a safe and quiet place for a hedgehog to hibernate for the winter. Plus, sing a song about Pablo the Pig and Carlos the Calf and get ready for a campfire sing-along.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for a farming sing-along! When Ella is feeling anxious, she does the five senses shakedown to feel better. Plus, learn that its okay to make mistakes and that tidying up can be fun.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Being a good friend is the best! Join JJ as he learns some very important lessons. When his friends want to play, he discovers the joy of sharing. Through a day of play, he learns that saying please and thank you and being kind makes every game more fun for everyone.

programme.title: Nina Time
programme.desc: Get ready for Ninas song and dance! The friends dance with all the baby animals at the petting zoo. They go on a scavenger hunt to find flowers that match the colors of the rainbow. They dream of flying high in the sky like their pilot dad. Nina chases a surprise egg through the grocery store and tries to catch bubbles without popping them. Plus, she celebrates her birthday with a piata and learns some healthy habits.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready to learn and sing! In this educational adventure, JJ discovers the magic of numbers, the beauty of colors, and the fun of shapes. Each new lesson is a new song, making the learning process an exciting and joyful experience. Its a musical story that proves how fun it is to learn new things.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its time to learn about safety at the fire station! The family learns how to slide down the pole and use the hose to put out a fire. Bingo gets a new kitty friend and Dad shows his goofy and adventurous side. The friends play musical chairs, pretend to be mermaids at the beach and Baby John gets the hiccups. Plus, the family learns about Dia de los Muertos and has fun at a birthday party.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Being safe is the number one rule for having fun! A friendly police officer teaches Baby John how to cross the street safely, and his parents show him why its important to be careful at the playground. He learns that following safety rules is the best way to play and explore with confidence.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Lets love our planet with Blippi and friends! In a special musical episode, they sing all about recycling and taking care of the Earth. Blippi and Meekah build the ultimate playground, the Blippi Clubhouse! Then, join an adventure down a river as a boulder becomes sand and travel back in time to see how even the smallest dinosaur can be a big help. Blippi also learns about lions and how to mix colors to paint a beautiful rainbow.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: The world is full of wonders, and Blippi is ready to explore them! In this adventure, Blippi Wonders travels to Ancient Egypt to learn about the pyramids, then dives deep into the human brain to see how it works. From history to biology, its a journey that celebrates the wonderful and diverse world we live in.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Get ready for fun and games with Buster! He gets caught in a storm but bravely rescues his friend Scout. He plays with balloons and floats high into the sky! He imagines hes a fish in the ocean and a cowboy in the Wild West. He even plays skittles, goes to a soft play center for hide and seek and helps stop a runaway train.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster has a wobbly tooth and its the start of a big adventure! After getting hit by a football, he and his friends race to the dentist. He and his friends get stuck in the mud on their way to see shooting stars and get lost in a storm in the woods. Buster also gets a surprise paint job, becomes a flying superhero and discovers a monster in the frightful forest.

programme.desc: Cody has amazing friends and they have great adventures together! He and JJ imagine theyre in an extreme motor trike race. He and Cece go on a nature walk and help a lost duckling find its home. During recess, Cody plays with all the other Melon Patch kids. Even when hes alone, Cody has fun playing with his favorite blankie and making leaf crowns in the autumn leaves.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Whats on the menu today? Fun! Join JJ as he learns why its great to eat vegetables with the Yes Yes Vegetables song. Then, get your hands ready for a fun time in the kitchen as he sings and claps along to Pat-a-Cake. Its a delicious and musical tale about our favorite foods.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: If youre happy, sing along with JJ and friends! Enjoy story time with Little Bunny Foo Foo and sing about all the animals on Grandpas farm. Play with five little animals on a sleepy Saturday morning. Learn how to be brave on the playground, use your imagination with a pretend play song and discover all the cool shapes in your lunchbox. Its a day of happy songs and playful learning!

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Its a day of city-wide chaos as Mila and Morphle are on a mission to find the Mayors lost dog, Barky! With Morphle morphed into a super search-dog, they follow the trail. But their heroic search is interrupted when they must also deal with the naughty Fruit Bandits, who are causing mayhem across town. Its a hectic adventure of tracking clues and stopping troublemakers to restore peace and bring Barky home.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Theres trouble in the city, and Officer Morphle is on patrol! His day starts when he has to stop a giant baby from causing chaos. The capers continue as he must then chase down a giant, runaway globe thats rolling through the streets. From stopping pesky bandits to solving mysteries, its a day full of action and adventure for the bravest cop car in town.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Get ready for a funky monkey! Having never seen a wild animal in real life, the friends take TK to the Safari Planet for a jungle adventure. When they get back, they are out of ingredients for their favorite salad, so they head to the Garden Planet to plant their own veggies and learn about tool safety.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Lets go for a fun run! While visiting the Jogging Planet, the crew learns that being overcompetitive and racing to be first doesnt always result in a fun time. Later, they travel to the Traffic Light Planet to learn about road safety, but once again, they let competition get in the way of learning.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready to sing along with all your favorite friends! When Miss Pollys dolly gets sick, Twinkle and Mummy are there to help. The family takes a sleepy bus ride home and the kids learn to be nimble and brave at the ball pit. They make their own instruments, learn about colors and have a fun day at the farm. programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready to sing your heart out with Mia! She and her friend Bari pretend to be bakers and make yummy cupcakes. She and her dad take a splashy ride in her car on a rainy day. She and her friend Maple learn about big and small while playing in the garden. She also learns about avocados, kangaroos and how to make her own instruments.

programme.title: ARPO

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Brace yourself for a series of wacky inventions and robotic mishaps! Arpo faces everything from a harmless kitchen timer he mistakes for a bomb to a drone that wont leave him alone. When a multiplying ray gets into the wrong hands, it creates more trouble than anyone can handle. These adventures are a fun look at how technology and curiosity can lead to the most unexpected and comical situations.

The team helps Weasel when he gets sick, has a balloon race for Miles birthday and helps Trevor fix his farm on Earth Day.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Jump into a world of music and fun with Baby John! Follow him through a day where every moment has a special song. programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: The sun is shining, and its a perfect day for the playground! Join Baby John as he explores the swings, the slide, and the sandbox. programme.desc: Get ready for some pumpkin munch mayhem! Newt has grown a giant pumpkin for Halloween, but a hungry Wrigglepillar keeps trying to eat it. programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: The sun has set, but Baby John isnt ready for sleep! Follow him as he tries to delay bedtime with one last game. programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: After a long day of play, its time for some quiet time. When Baby John is tired, he can be a little cranky, so a nap will help him feel better. programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Get ready for some thrilling adventures with Blippi Wonders! This journey is packed with excitement and learning. programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Spend a day in the life of Buster! He plays a prank at the carwash and when his friend Scout gets a boo boo, he becomes Dr. Buster. programme.title: Go Buster

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: This story is a celebration of family! Follow JJ through a day spent with the people he loves most. programme.title: Dance Party

Whether hes discovering a new animal or learning a new game, he commemorates the moment with a joyful and catchy song, proving that music makes every experience more memorable.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Oh no, theres an emergency! But dont worry, the lifesavers are here. Baby John learns about the incredible jobs that firefighters and police officers do to help people. He sees how they use their special vehicles and tools to keep the entire neighborhood safe, a thrilling tribute to our brave community heroes.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for some cupcake chaos! Lulu wants to bake a cupcake by herself, but when she doesnt follow the recipe, it turns into a giant, out-of-control blob! She also finds a colorful egg that hatches into a cute chick, but she has to let it go back to its mommy. The friends paint a big picture together, but Newt wants it all for herself.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready to build a Snowbod! Pogo wants to show Lulu how fun snow can be, so they build a snowman together, but the sun comes out and starts to melt it! Lulu reads a story about a magical Snowhoof and sets off to find it in real life. On the ice, Fuse gets impatient when Jeff cant learn how to skate as quickly as the others.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Youre invited to a nursery rhyme dance party! Rock out to a remix of Rockabye Baby with a band of monkeys and dance faster and faster as London Bridge falls down. Fly into outer space to dance among the stars, then dive deep under the sea to swim like a mermaid. Dance about the weather, sing about popping bubbles and play a fun game of freeze dance.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Join JJ for a day of nursery rhyme adventures with his animal friends. First, help Mary find her little lamb, then sing about a black sheep with lots of wool. The fun ends with a clapping game all about a farm dog named BINGO. Its a charming story told through our favorite animal songs.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Its time for giggles and fun! When JJs toy is broken, Boba cheers him up by pretending to be a tickly caterpillar. The friends find a disco mat and have a groovy dance-off. When JJ gets frustrated while skiing, Mochi is there to encourage him. A pirate swipes the bath toys and a buzzing fly interrupts breakfast. Plus, Wally plays firefighter and ends up being the one who needs rescuing!

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to explore Earth and nature! A frog ballerina shows Ella that rain can be fun and is important for the farm. The friends celebrate Earth Day by litter picking and composting. When some of the animals get sick, Ella helps the vet at a makeshift animal hospital. Plus, watch a caterpillar turn into a butterfly and learn some yoga moves with Rishis mom.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for a farming sing-along! When Ella is feeling anxious, she does the five senses shakedown to feel better. She and Rishi play a game of I Hear With My Little Ear to find all the animals on the farm. Do the ABC dance, go stargazing with Grandma Mei and take care of five mischievous monkeys. Plus, learn that its okay to make mistakes and that tidying up can be fun.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle
programme.desc: Twinkle loves playtime and so do her friends! They bounce high on a trampoline and learn about safety. They play with musical instruments and find a surprise music box in the forest. They discover an umbrella and learn how to use it to stay dry in the rain. They also have fun with wobbly Jello, squeaky shoes and making funny faces in the mirror.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle
programme.desc: Lets learn about colors and shapes! Twinkle has fun painting a picture with lots of different colors. She and her friends learn all about the colors of the rainbow, first with some baby birds, then on a rainbow slide and finally with a rainbow bubble bath. They build a tower with rainbow stones and learn all about the different shapes of the clouds.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Lets go up, up and away! The gang wants to get balloons for a party, so they travel to the Party Planet. While there, they discover an egg and must return it to a nest high on a mountain of presents. On their way home, Rob finds a stowaway space frog on the rocket and the crew must find it a better place to live.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: An invitation to an intergalactic space race arrives, but the friends cant agree on who should compete. They decide to have a friendly competition on the Race Planet to settle it. Afterwards, when a flower Orbit is painting begins to wilt, the crew heads to the Garden Planet to find him a beautiful new one.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: The sun has set, but Baby John isnt ready for sleep! Follow him as he tries to delay bedtime with one last game. His patient parents guide him through a soothing routine, from a warm bath to a sweet lullaby, showing him that getting ready for bed can be a comforting and happy time after a long day of fun.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its time to wind down with JJ. Follow his soothing bedtime routine, from taking a warm bath to brushing his teeth. As he looks out his window at the night sky, he sings Twinkle Twinkle Little Star before snuggling into bed for a sweet lullaby. Its a peaceful and relaxing journey into dreamland.

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of the Oddbods! This collection of bite-size adventures follows seven colorful friends with very big, and very different, personalities. Whether its Fuses hot-headedness, Pogos pranks, or Zees laziness, their unique traits clash in spectacular fashion. Watch as simple, everyday situations spiral into unpredictable and hilarious mayhem, proving that with the Oddbods, life is never, ever dull.

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of the Oddbods! This collection of bite-size adventures follows seven colorful friends with very big, and very different, personalities. Whether its Fuses hot-headedness, Pogos pranks, or Zees laziness, their unique traits clash in spectacular fashion. Watch as simple, everyday situations spiral into unpredictable and hilarious mayhem, proving that with the Oddbods, life is never, ever dull.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Join JJ on a magical carousel ride where his imagination turns him into a brave knight! When hes feeling scared, Dad helps him blast off in a pretend rocketship. Build an amazing maze for Jellybean the hamster, put on sunscreen at the beach and play a fun game of Peek-a-Boo. Then, become a detective and help solve the mystery of who took the cookies from the cookie jar!

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Grab your instrument and march along to John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt! Get into the holiday spirit with Up on the Housetop and Deck the Halls. Make a splash down by the bay and get active with fun exercise dance moves. Crawl like the Itsy Bitsy Spider, swim with the mermaids and do the Chuchuwa dance. Its a musical marching adventure!

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Youre invited to a dance and play party! Go on a make-believe adventure to outer space or the bottom of the sea. Find your Happy Place, and then do the Coco Dance and the Looby Loo. Sing about friendship, play a game of Red Light, Green Light, and have a Copy Me style dance-off on the playground. Its party time!

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Its party time with Pogo! Hes invited to Jeffs party, but they cant agree on what kind of party it should be. Bubbles invents a new bouncy blob that gets out of control. When Lulu loses her favorite bunny, Bubbles becomes her superhero and helps her find it. Plus, Fuse learns that eating his greens will give him more energy.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for some pumpkin munch mayhem! Newt has grown a giant pumpkin for Halloween, but a hungry Wrigglepillar keeps trying to eat it. In a football game, Bubbles cheats to help her team win. Jeff is excited for a dancing game, but Fuse wont listen to the instructions and ruins the fun.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Mal terus berusaha menyakat Chelsea. Tapi Adam sudah semakin rapat dengan Chelsea. Chelsea mula sedar bergaduh dengan Mal kerja sia-sia. Tapi Mal tak peduli.

programme.desc: Zahrin diberhentikan kerja oleh bosnya. Maimun pula masih berusaha untuk jadi influencer dan cuba buat bisnes online tetapi gagal kerana tidak berbakat. Bonda terkejut Zahrin menghidap sakit kanser.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: well be seeing the best penguin fails, p-p-p-party penguins, well get up close and personal with wild animals, and well go on safari. well also meet angry animals living the thug life, some crazy critters, and well watch sporty animals in action.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Lucy the Staffie cross has been kept inside a dark house for so long that its affected her eyes and she is extremely overweight. She is taken into the RSPCAs care but will Lucy be able to shed some pounds and adapt to life in the great outdoors?

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: Dachshund, prince of the dog world and American pitbull, the gangster boss compete to see who is the cutest? There are many problems when taking your dog out for a walk, pet trainer teaches your dog to walk well in 3 steps! What are the precautions for daily care of dogs dog owners are most concerned about? Remember to deworm regularly to give them a fullout protection! Lets make a nutritious fresh pet food cake together! Tainans first leisure farm designed specifically for pets, keep your furry friends entertained through spring outings and play in the water!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt tackles a pet shop owner who wants to keep poisonous snakes with two-inch fangs. He undertakes an urgent biopsy on an African hornbill who is losing weight and could have a fatal condition. And its a testing time at Flamingoland as one white rhino is shipped out and two new rhino calves are introduced to their new home.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the worlds largest and most famous dog show: "Crufts".nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled "Best in Show". These are the loveable family pets competing to win the "Scruffts" title.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Sulcata tortoises are the third largest land tortoise in the world, native to the Sahel Corridor in Africa. They do not come from the desert!!! They need to take baths and drink water too!!!nThey are 5 to 7 centimeters tall at birth, with bright black eyes that are super attractive. They grow really fast when healthy, adults can reach 0.9 meters in size and live over 100 years. But they will easily catch a cold and get sick if you are not careful. How to keep your turtles healthy? Lets hear what the experts say!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve scoured the internet to bring you the most hilarious clips of Budgies (and other birds) on the planet, not so much -whos a clever boy- as -whos a funny boy-! Flying fails, performing Parrots and the real life angry birds -V weve assembled the very best the web has to offer, guaranteed to make you laugh out loud.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Samoyed dogs, known as "smiling angels" are in fact not easy to raise. They require enough love and dedication, especially extraordinary physical strength!!! For you to be happy and healthy with them.nIf you want to raise a Samoyed, or already own one, we hope you can give them the best care and love, and make them your best partners. Come and jot notes of the hard work and tears shared by expert owners :)!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt rushes off to answer an urgent call from Flamingoland, where a pregnant rare pygmy goat may need an emergency caesarean. Eight abandoned baby rabbits need some very close attention while back at the zoo theres been trouble at the lemur house. A fight has left one female with a nasty wound but shed reluctant to receive treatment.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: Super eye-catching! Herbivorous animal celebrity appears?! Delicate pets being snubby! They get angry if theres no air conditioning?! Genius horse trainer challenges the rapport between human and horses?! Fresh grass is so sweet that even humans love to eat it?! Growing up with sheep! Experts reveal the secrets of sheep?!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: At Flamingoland two lambs have worrying scabs in their mouths and Dr. Matt is concerned it could be infectious. He tries to help a family save their much-loved pet but the future looks bleak for Rosie the hen. Meanwhile another familys pet dog doesnt take too kindly to the attentions of a vet. And Aztec the Harris Hawk needs a spot of surgery.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: At a house in Hull, Inspector Claire Little rescues two flea infested Staffordshire Bull Terriers named Roxy and Madison that are missing half of their fur. As Claire begins her investigation, will the scratching Staffies be able to recover?

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Because of her love for cats, Claire carefully created a place called "There is a Cat at the Corner". While enjoying your meals and drinks, more than a dozen beautiful cats are strolling freely in the store, waiting to interact with you up close and enjoy a slow life with you. However, if you want to pet the cat yourself and win their favor, you must first understand the nature and preferences of cats! Claire also generously shares her "experiences in ruling over dozens of cats", which is extremely precious. Novice cat lovers should come and have a look!

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: At a house in Hull, Inspector Claire Little rescues two flea infested Staffordshire Bull Terriers named Roxy and Madison that are missing half of their fur. As Claire begins her investigation, will the scratching Staffies be able to recover?

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Because of her love for cats, Claire carefully created a place called "There is a Cat at the Corner". While enjoying your meals and drinks, more than a dozen beautiful cats are strolling freely in the store, waiting to interact with you up close and enjoy a slow life with you. However, if you want to pet the cat yourself and win their favor, you must first understand the nature and preferences of cats! Claire also generously shares her "experiences in ruling over dozens of cats", which is extremely precious. Novice cat lovers should come and have a look!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve scoured the internet to bring you the most hilarious clips of Budgies (and other birds) on the planet, not so much -whos a clever boy- as -whos a funny boy-! Flying fails, performing Parrots and the real life angry birds -V weve assembled the very best the web has to offer, guaranteed to make you laugh out loud.

programme.title: Best Of Pets

programme.desc: Samoyed dogs, known as "smiling angels" are in fact not easy to raise. They require enough love and dedication, especially extraordinary physical strength!!! programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The era of high housing prices shocks the masses. However, some are willing to live in the mountains for their beloved parrots, just to give them the best breeding environment. Parrots have a long lifespan and their IQ is comparable to that of a five-year-old child. How do you make them behave? Training is actually a good way, but how? "Melon seeds" are key to the goal. If you want to raise a parrot, there are in fact many restrictions on choosing the right one. How should I put it? Dont miss "Cute Pet Guide"!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt helps to save a badger knocked down by car but will it return to the wild? He relieves a cat with a particular problem and helps a farmer catch a runaway calf. Up at the Zoo he knocks out a polar bear and puts a Zebra back on her feet.

programme.title: My House And Other Animals
programme.desc: Meet the modern-day Dr Doolittles with a passion for all creatures great and small: the unsung heroes of the wildlife world, whose homes have become havens for every animal imaginable.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Brother Hui, who runs an amphibian and reptile store in Xinxing District, Kaohsiung City, has a wide range of knowledge in the field of reptiles. He started with red-eared sliders and gradually got in touch with tortoises, lizards, snakes and other reptile pets. In Brother Huis brick-and-mortar store, the most special existence is the two store pets, the South American lizards. The male is called Meatball and the female is called Porkball. How did their fate with Brother Hui begin? Brother Hui, who has many years of experience in raising South American lizards, also generously share his breeding secrets. How to distinguish male and female South American lizards? How to keep them healthy? Whats the secret to taming them? In this epsiode, we unpack the living environment of South American lizards and reveal the breeding guide!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as youve never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAPs, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. Theres a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In a very special festive edition of The Dog Rescuers, Inspector Lyndsey Taylor is called to a case of a desperate dog, left home alone at Christmas. With concern growing for the dogs health, can Lyndsey secure a warrant for police to enter the property in time?

programme.title: Spice Is Nice
programme.desc: Flavor, flavor, flavor. Frankie shows us the way around the spice cabinet. All it takes is a couple primary dried spices to make a variety of homemade spice blends. Bonus: Frankie also tackles a monster challenge with our favorite monster guest!

programme.title: Root-to-Stem
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to use whole vegetables, from root-to-stem, which means no food goes to waste. Learn how to use vegetable stalks you would normally throw away. Root-to-stem cooking: less waste, more food, and more nutrition. Frankies favorite

programme.title: Hotdishes
programme.desc: You say hotdishes, Frankie says casserole. Either way, these one-pot hotdishes are an affordable way to feed a group of people, or the family for dinner. Plus theyre great to freeze for future meals!

programme.title: Cheesin
programme.desc: Cheese can be really expensive. Frankie teaches us how to cook with more affordable cheese swaps, and we learn how to stretch cheese in a dish so it can be the star without breaking the bank. Bonus: Frankie teaches how to make cheese at home!

programme.title: Meat: More Bang For Your Buck
programme.desc: Its time to reduce the cost of meat on your grocery bill. Frankie shows us which cuts of meat provide the most bang for our buck, and equally as important, how to cook them for optimal flavor.

programme.title: But First, Brunch
programme.desc: Bring your loved ones together over a delicious brunch spread made with love. Whether youre celebrating a major milestone or simply toasting to the weekend, Frankies money-saving menu will have guests buzzing for more.

programme.title: Doing Brunch Right, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill brings big brunch vibes with her favorite weekend dishes including NY-style bacon, egg, and cheese sandwich with black pepper bacon, Maryland-style Old Bay crab cake benedict, coquito French toast bites, and a berry-ful Aperol spritz!

programme.title: Moroccan Lamb with Sangria, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill welcomes the coziness of fall with some fabulous flavors And dishes including Moroccan lamb with dates And harissa, fall sangria with apples And amaretto, garlicky rice pilaf, roasted root vegetables, and crispy cucumber salad. Its fall yall!

programme.title: Plantains and Rice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill celebrates Hispanic Heritage Month with her moms recipes as well as some of her own. Shell whip up a coconut coquito cocktail, Cuban-style black beans, a garlicky arroz con pollo with sofrito, and some salty and sweet plantains.

programme.title: Pizza Slice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill throws a pizza party with her delicious homemade pies! She creates a sweet and savory pie with spicy pepperoni And pineapple, a tangy BBQ chicken pizza, a grandma deep dish pie with mozzarella And chorizo, and an herby salad flatbread.

programme.title: Turn Up For Tomatoes
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to prepare tomatoes fresh in a variety of ways. And for even more savings, Frankie will share a few tips on how to preserve them so you can enjoy their freshness throughout the year.

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: Date night doesnt have to be at an over-priced, mediocre restaurant. Frankie prepares an affordable and delicious sushi date night at home, plus tips on how to set date night ambiance at home on a struggle budget. That special someone will love it!

programme.title: Veteran

programme.title: The Moon

programme.title: Deadman

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Smugglers

programme.title: Sisters on the Road

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E081
programme.desc: Nicols y Florencia se casan por lo civil. Fernanda devuelve Cantarrana a Hilario, pero sin la parte de las tierras que el le diera a Florencia. Florencia descubre que Nicols se caso con ella a cambio de que Fernanda le devolviera Cantarrana a Victoria.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E082
programme.desc: Clementina sorprende a Felipe besando a Antonieta. Florencia revela a Victoria que ella es la nueva duea de las tierras desde su casa hasta Los Samanes. Adelaida y Hansen se besan.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E92
programme.desc: Octavia, ayuda a Astrid en la preparacion del matrimonio y disfruta pensando en lo que Camila siente. Esta y Max, muy dolidos sabe que deben olvidarse. Fausto, insiste en que Roger y Fernando planifiquen la muerte de Ezequiel.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E93
programme.desc: Marcelina, familiares y el juez se preocupan por la ausencia de Max. Astrid acusa a Camila de estar de acuerdo para hacerla pasar este mal rato. Llega el novio, bebido y ayudado por Ezequiel. Firman sus votos matrimoniales. A los meses, Astrid, estresada, pes desea un hijo para asegurar la fortuna. Ezequiel, sin resultados, queriendo enamorar a Camila.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E112
programme.desc: Israel demands that Pastora leave her house; the woman lets it be known that Illis impersonated her.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E113
programme.desc: A seductive Pastora welcomes Amado, but then becomes aggressive; she wants to know how much he has paid the lawyer for betraying her.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E112
programme.desc: Gertrudis calls Michelle to get rid of Pacos lifeless body. It was very easy for her to kill for the second time, to the point of feeling very calm and affirming that this way she solves the problems very quickly. Norma discovers everything, but she is not willing to be an accomplice to a murder - Omar receives a call that breaks him down, some police officers found Pacos body.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E88
programme.desc: El joven Ibez se deshace en atenciones para con Adriana cuando llega Carlos Ral dejndole claro a Santiago que Adriana ser su futura esposa.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E89
programme.desc: Adriana acepta alejarse un poco de su enamorado mientras Azalea mejora; de pronto suena el timbre y es nada menos que Santiago Ibaez

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E90
programme.desc: Raiza se complace en ver la cara de sorpresa de Cesar, quien, al reaccionar, la toma del brazo con fuerza para sacarla del lugar.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E082
programme.desc: Clementina sorprende a Felipe besando a Antonieta. Florencia revela a Victoria que ella es la nueva duea de las tierras desde su casa hasta Los Samanes. Adelaida y Hansen se besan.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E083
programme.desc: Hilario advierte a Moncho que, para volver a ganarse su confianza, deber hacer todo lo que el le pida sin importar de que se trate. Florencia le pide a Nicols que se queden trabajando sus tierras para demostrarle a los Guanipa que no les temen y que, cuando el sienta que la ama, se casen por la iglesia. Ya en su casa, Hilario trata de explicarle a Victoria que se equivoca al pensar que Florencia es ms importante que ella para el, le ruega a Victoria que lo perdone; pero la muchacha, que est demasiado herida, se marcha de Cantarrana asegurando que ya no lo puede ver como su padre.Adelaida se complace al ver lo que se ha esmerado Hansen por preparar la velada para compartir con ella. Victoria le confiesa a Clementina lo mucho que le duele sentir que ya no puede estar orgullosa de ser la hija de Hilario Guanipa como siempre lo hizo.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E93
programme.desc: Marcelina, familiares y el juez se preocupan por la ausencia de Max. Astrid acusa a Camila de estar de acuerdo para hacerla pasar este mal rato. Llega el novio, bebido y ayudado por Ezequiel. Firman sus votos matrimoniales. A los meses, Astrid, estresada, pes desea un hijo para asegurar la fortuna. Ezequiel, sin resultados, queriendo enamorar a Camila.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E94
programme.desc: Anton se lleva secuestrado a Ezequiel y avisa a Fausto, para que tenga el placer de matarlo. Bajo engao citan a Amelia y Sebastin para hacer razonar a Fausto que liberen a Ezequiel, de lo contrario ella y su hijo por nacer, morirn.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E113
programme.desc: A seductive Pastora welcomes Amado, but then becomes aggressive; she wants to know how much he has paid the lawyer for betraying her.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E114
programme.desc: Pastora, in Illis room, analyzes in which flask to dilute an acid with which she intends to deform her twin.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E113
programme.desc: Gertrudis gives the news to Alfonso and Jose Pablo that they are already freeing Malena, who comes out at that moment and hugs her mother and thanks her for what she did. Alberto and Lorena meet in a cafe, he summoned her there because he needed to see her alone.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E114
programme.desc: The housekeeper confronts Lorena to make her admit that she still loves Alberto and she evades by saying that she is Omars girlfriend. Then it is Lorena who confronts Norma to make her tell the truth about what she knows, and the latter, although terrified, ends up confessing that Gertrudis did murder Paco; but she cannot say anything because she has a death threat against her.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E115
programme.desc: Opening a drawer, Malena finds a picture frame with broken glass, with an old photo of her and Isabel. Alfonso arrives and discovers it, but Malena reacts with great annoyance towards him - Norma is about to leave the room, with the gun hidden inside a laundry basket, when she is surprised by the arrival of Gertrudis.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E90
programme.desc: Raiza se complace en ver la cara de sorpresa de Cesar, quien, al reaccionar, la toma del brazo con fuerza para sacarla del lugar.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E91
programme.desc: En un nuevo da; Salvatore advierte a Nacho que quiere que acabe con Adriana ese mismo da.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E083
programme.desc: Hilario advierte a Moncho que, para volver a ganarse su confianza, deber hacer todo lo que el le pida sin importar de que se trate. Florencia le pide a Nicols que se queden trabajando sus tierras para demostrarle a los Guanipa que no les temen y que, cuando el sienta que la ama, se casen por la iglesia. Ya en su casa, Hilario trata de explicarle a Victoria que se equivoca al pensar que Florencia es ms importante que ella para el, le ruega a Victoria que lo perdone; pero la muchacha, que est demasiado herida, se marcha de Cantarrana asegurando que ya no lo puede ver como su padre.Adelaida se complace al ver lo que se ha esmerado Hansen por preparar la velada para compartir con ella. Victoria le confiesa a Clementina lo mucho que le duele sentir que ya no puede estar orgullosa de ser la hija de Hilario Guanipa como siempre lo hizo.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E084
programme.desc: Adelaida y Hansen hacen el amor por primera vez. Hilario quiere reconciliase con Adelaida para que ella lo ayude a recuperar el afecto de Victoria. Victoria le revela a Nicols que Florencia le hizo creer a Hilario que lo quera para obtener parte de las tierras de Cantarrana.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E94
programme.desc: Anton se lleva secuestrado a Ezequiel y avisa a Fausto, para que tenga el placer de matarlo. Bajo engao citan a Amelia y Sebastin para hacer razonar a Fausto que liberen a Ezequiel, de lo contrario ella y su hijo por nacer, morirn.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E95
programme.desc: Ezequiel y Fausto, enfrentados. Camila intenta convencer a Roger de que suelten a Ezequiel. La situacion se complica pes Amelia, detenida como rehen y acompaada por Sebastin, ya presenta dolores de parto.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E114
programme.desc: Pastora, in Illis room, analyzes in which flask to dilute an acid with which she intends to deform her twin.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E115
programme.desc: Pretending to be offended, Tamara loudly complains about having to sleep with Gabriel when she enters his room, Baron kisses her in order to shut her up.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E114
programme.desc: The housekeeper confronts Lorena to make her admit that she still loves Alberto and she evades by saying that she is Omars girlfriend. Then it is Lorena who confronts Norma to make her tell the truth about what she knows, and the latter, although terrified, ends up confessing that Gertrudis did murder Paco; but she cannot say anything because she has a death threat against her.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E115
programme.desc: Opening a drawer, Malena finds a picture frame with broken glass, with an old photo of her and Isabel. programme.title: Dropped - S06:E05 - Round Two
programme.desc: Tensions run high as Chris and Casey disagree on what their next course of action should be. Without clear cache directions, the brothers are left with a hard choice. Should they stay, or should they go?

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E06 - Peaks and Valleys
programme.desc: Chris and Casey hike the mountainside, but the steep slopes and shifting shale make the trek anything but easy. The brothers face energy depletion and exhaustion, and they feel the pressure to find new food sources soon, or go hungry.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E13 - Operation Wolf Creek
programme.desc: Wardens are on the lookout for any illegal hunting around Wolf Creek, Montana. In another spot, theyre running a setup with a fake mule deer to catch hunters breaking the rules.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E04 - Desperate Times
programme.desc: Island Air drops off a group of desperate hunters in the heart of the bush as a deep freeze hits Kodiak.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E05 - Delta Prison Rescue Operation
programme.desc: In 1989, CIA operative Kurt Muse was imprisoned at the notorious Carcel Modelo in Panama for his role in organizing radio transmissions against dictator Manuel Noriega. That December, an elite group of the US Delta Force breached the roof of the prison, and one of the most daring close quarter battle operations in history began. From the dramatic helicopter crash and wounding of several Delta operators to the extraction of the entire team by the 5th Infantry Division, this is prime material for CQB analysis. In this episode, CQB recreates the raid, focusing on the "sub-second" reflexes of the Delta Force team from the moment they entered the prison to their extraction from the roof of the prison by an MH-6 "Little Bird" helicopter.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E05 - Capturing the Wild
programme.desc: After seeing the disappearance of wildlife in northern Africa, Ivan joins an elite capture team to see how wildlife is captured, bought, and sold. This Wildlife Trade is a ground breaking business model that could change the entire face of conservation in Africa.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E06 - Princess Dianas Legacy
programme.desc: Reflecting on Dianas legacy, this show delves into what Princess Diana left behind after her sudden passing - the impression she left on her children, the royal family, and the people who loved her. The young princes drew admiration with their demeanor at her funeral, but many questioned how their bond with Prince Charles would be moving forward.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E35 - Prince Charles At 50 Heir To Sadness
programme.desc: After Dianas death, everyones attention turned to Charles, who was not only a widower and a dad but also next in line for the throne. This show takes a closer look at how he got along with his sons, his longtime love Camilla, and what his future might look like as King. Royal experts David Starkey and Anthony Holden share their insights.

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E07 - Day in the Life
programme.desc: The raft continues to cause problems as Chris and Casey spend valuable energy trying to stay afloat. With their days in the South Pacific dwindling, the brothers have reached their breaking pointuntil a new discovery leaves a lasting impact.

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E08 - Bridge the Gap
programme.desc: Chris and Casey have hiked across New Zealand for weeks. Fighting for their lives has taken a toll on their emotions and abilities. They team up to hunt feral pigs, but the cache items used for survival create new challenges and deep frustrations.

programme.title: Wardens - S03:E01 - Operation Grizzly Bear
programme.desc: This week, wardens are tackling a situation involving a missing child that was reportedly pulled away by a bear... Luckily, its just a training drill. At the same time, shed antler hunting season kicks off, keeping the wardens busy!

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E05 - Risky Business
programme.desc: Pilot Peter Rosendahl combats gail force wind and choppy seas while taxiing a group of hunters to a floating lodge.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E06 - Snipers and Scout
programme.desc: Joint Task Force Two (JTF 2) is the elite Canadian Forces Special Operations unit responsible for a broad range of missions, including counter-terrorism and armed assistance to other government departments. Highly secretive, JTF 2 and its predecessor, the Canadian Airborne Regiment, have been deployed in hotspots around the world from Haiti to Bosnia. This episode focuses on the legendary JTF sniper teams and their use in Afghanistan alongside the British SAS and the US Delta Force at "the sharp end of the spear." A book written by an ex-JTF member explains how, in 2006, both the Pentagon and the British Foreign Office noted the instrumental role that JTF 2 played in the rescue of the British and Canadian Christian Peacemaker Team held hostage in Iraq. Unique in look, the FN P90 personal defense weapon, used by JTF 2 soldiers and special police around the world, will be highlighted in this program.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S05:E07 - Slaying the Port Labelle Monster
programme.desc: Manny tangles with a monster hog in the dense woods of Port Labelle.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S05:E08 - Save a Watermelon Kill a Boar Part 1
programme.desc: Manny tracks down a boar raiding watermelon fields in southwestern Florida.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E06 - On the Frontline
programme.desc: From rhino saviors and lion researchers, to savvy entrepreneurs and armed security teams, Ivan tours the front lines of conservation to meet the individuals who are reshaping and protecting wild Africa. What does it really mean to devote your life to the cause of conservation? Ivan journeys to four separate countries to find out what makes these unsung heroes tick.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E12 - The New Royals
programme.desc: Princesses Beatrice and Eugenie have gone through a lot of media attention and tough situations in their lives. From their parents very public split to being targeted by the press, theyve been through quite a bit. Despite all this, they remain dedicated to supporting the monarchy with their charity work. Through serving the Commonwealth, both sisters continue to make a positive impact.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S01:E08 - Secret Trade
programme.desc: Ivan Carter investigates Africas infamous poaching trade.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E01 - Manny Goes Medieval
programme.desc: Manny demonstrates his medieval skills, taking a huge wild boar with Viking-style spears.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E02 - Drought and Danger
programme.desc: Manny investigates how severe drought has caused wildlife to congregate near any water.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E03 - Black Bear Explosion
programme.desc: Manny explores a Florida swamp swarming with black bears.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E04 - Pitch Black
programme.desc: Manny explores a primitive river in pitch black darkness And encounters a monster.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E01 - Man Eating Crocodiles of Zimbabwe
programme.desc: Mario takes a huge gamble by rafting along Africas most dangerous river, the Zambezi, heading towards Lake Reba. But he ends up face-to-face with some of the largest and most fearsome man-eating crocodiles around.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E02 - Namibian Desert Oryx
programme.desc: Mario heard from some locals about a strange-looking creature deep in the Namibian desert. So, he decided to brave the sweltering heat in a hot air balloon to track down the oryx.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E03 - Kalahari Bushmen
programme.desc: In the Kalahari desert, theres an old tribe living off the land. Mario spends a week working hard to gather food to share with them.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E04 - Untouched Atolls
programme.desc: Just off the coast of Africa is a strip of 115 islands called the Seychelles. Mario educates his audience as to how to fish for reef species. Out of know where he even attempts to swim with a sailfish.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S02:E12 - Texas Hog
programme.desc: Laramy travels to the land of Texas to add wild hog to his larder.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S02:E13 - Best of Season 2
programme.desc: We take a look back at Laramy Sasquatch Millers adventures from this season.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S03:E01 - New Mexico Antelope
programme.desc: Laramy meets up with his old mountain man buddy, Bloody Hand, to hunt some of New Mexicos fastest game, the antelope.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S03:E02 - Elk Part 1
programme.desc: Laramy treks deep into the Colorado Rockies to bow hunt for elk.

programme.title: Falling for the Competition
